snippet: Some prominent cases of insider trading have involved wealthy people who made relatively little in profit from the trades and who fought charges when settling would have been cheaper.
abstract: Some prominent cases of insider trading have involved wealthy people who made relatively little in profit from the trades and who fought charges when settling would have been cheaper.

headline.main: Insider Trading Riddle: Why Do the Rich Risk It?
headline.print_headline: White Collar Watch: Insider Trading Riddle: Why Do the Rich Risk It?
